description: Add the ability to request a console url.  Should hand back a URL to access through the XVP proxy.
title: Ability to Request a Console URL

comments.content: Add the ability to request a console url.  Should hand back a URL to access through the XVP proxy.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~q-noreply

comments.content: This will likely need an extension, as the API spec doesn't support it. We could also extend the Admin API to provide it
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~q-noreply

comments.content: are you referring to vnc console or ?  If so there is an extension in the code already
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~q-noreply
